mapper.select: SELECT h.habit_id, h.title, h.description, hr.icon AS icon FROM habit h JOIN habit_records hr ON h.habit_id = hr.habit_id WHERE h.date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND h.uid = #{id}

SELECT h.habit_id, h.title, h.description, hr.icon AS icon FROM habit h JOIN habit_records hr ON h.habit_id = hr.habit_id WHERE h.date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND h.uid = #{uid} AND h.habit_id = #{habitId}
mapper.update: UPDATE habit h JOIN habit_records hr ON h.habit_id = hr.habit_id SET h.title = #{title}, h.description = #{description}, hr.icon = #{icon} WHERE h.date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND h.habit_id = #{habitId}
